resources.string: Allow application to work in background. Use it if Android stops music in few minutes.
The Piano Concerto No. 2 in C minor, Op. 18, is a concerto for piano and orchestra, 1st part - Moderato
Six moments musicaux: No. 3 Andante cantabile in B minor
Morceaux de fantaisie, No. 2, Prélude in C-sharp minor
Morceaux de fantaisie, No. 1, Élégie in E-flat minor
The Piano Sonata No. 23 in F minor, Op. 57 (Appassionata), part 1: Allegro assai
The Symphony No. 3 in E♭ major, Op. 55, (Heroic Symphony) - part 3: Scherzo: Allegro vivace
The Piano Sonata No. 8 (Pathétique) in C minor, Op. 13, part 2: Adagio cantabile
The Violin Concerto in D major, Op. 61, part 3: Rondo. Allegro (D major)
The Piano Sonata No. 14 (Moonlight Sonata) in C♯ minor \"Quasi una fantasia\", Op. 27, No. 2, part 2: Allegretto
The Piano Concerto No. 2 in B-flat major, Op. 19, part 3: Rondo Molto allegro
\"Schöne Minka, ich muss scheiden!\" Aus den Liedern verschiedener Völker (Songs of Various Nations)
The Symphony No. 5 in C minor, Op. 67, part 1
